t: Can I buy medicine from Amazon? If not, why? - Quora
s: Answer: You can only buy what is legal in the country it will be delivered to, and the country it was ordered from if that is different. Amazon does not have a pharmacy business in the US. I'm not sure about other countries but I've never heard that they do. It would be expensive and complicated...

t: Amazon Launches Its Own Line of OTC Drugs
s: The heightened competition could ... store-brand profit margins in an already disrupted pharmacy space.  · Long-standing brick-and-mortar retailers CVS, Walgreens and Rite Aid have already lost volumes to "grab and go" items online. In the past, customers have come in to quickly buy OTC medicine, leaving the store with a few extra add ons such as cosmetics, which stood as a major source of revenue for retailers.  · Amazon's sheer size ...
